author: Esmay Rosalyne
description:
T. Kingfisher has long proved herself to be the queen of the twisty, dark, satirical, genre-blendy fairytale retellings, but I think she truly outdid herself in Hemlock & Silver. Is it a fairytale fantasy? A portal fantasy? A horror fantasy? A cozy fantasy? A romance fantasy? Honestly, who even cares. It’s just a damned brilliant […]

The post REVIEW: Hemlock & Silver by T. Kingfisher appeared first on Grimdark Magazine.
title: REVIEW: Hemlock & Silver by T. Kingfisher
